about_the_game:
Step into the haunting atmosphere of an isolated warehouse, where every shadow hides a secret, and every corner is filled with dread. This horror game pushes your nerves to the limit, demanding constant vigilance as you monitor surveillance cameras for eerie anomalies. The once quiet space now holds inexplicable phenomena that slowly escalate in terror with each passing night.

Your mission is simple: survive the night shifts for one week. But survival isn’t as easy as it sounds. The anomalies you face grow more frequent and terrifying with each passing day. To protect yourself, you must actively switch between cameras, observe every inch of the warehouse, and when necessary, shut off cameras to make these anomalies vanish—if only for a short while. But beware, missing too many anomalies could spell your doom.

Each night brings new horrors that keep you on edge, testing your ability to stay calm under pressure. The warehouse may look ordinary, but as soon as you enter the night shift, you’ll realize that it’s anything but. Every sound will feel like a threat, and every image on the camera will make you question reality.

As you battle the isolation and fear, you’ll notice how quickly things spiral out of control. What starts as subtle changes—a misplaced object or a flicker of light—soon becomes outright terror. By the end of the week, the warehouse is a living nightmare, filled with horrifying anomalies that threaten your very sanity.

Can you keep your composure and survive until dawn, or will the warehouse’s sinister forces claim you as their next victim? Prepare for an intense, immersive experience where every decision counts, and your only defense is your wits and the cameras that separate you from the terror that lurks in the dark.

This is not just a horror game, it’s a test of endurance, as the line between reality and nightmare blurs more and more each night. Will you make it through the week? Or will the horrors lurking in the warehouse be too much to bear?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Enter a dark warehouse where you must monitor cameras and search for anomalies in a realistic environment. Can you spot the unusual events before there are too many? A suspenseful atmosphere and fear at every turn will pull you into this chilling horror experience.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, German, Czech
